import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup, FormBuilder, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'quiz-app-user-login', templateUrl: './user-login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-login.component.scss'], }) export class UserLoginComponent { quizLoginForm!: FormGroup; constructor(private fb: FormBuilder, private router: Router) {} ngOnInit() { this.quizLoginForm = this.fb.group({ username: ['', [Validators.required]], numberOfQuestions: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.min(1)]], difficulty: ['', [Validators.required]], category: ['', [Validators.required]], }); } onSubmit() { console.log(this.quizLoginForm.value); this.quizLoginForm.reset(); this.router.navigate(['/quizstart']); } }

User Login
